column3: Update:  N Broadway at W Loudon Ave:
column4: All inbound lanes are back open.  The roadway was closed due to investigation of a collision involving a pedestrian.

column5: Traffic on Palumbo Dr is being diverted to Codell Dr.

column4: Various streets on campus will be one-way.
Ave of Champions will be closed to thru traffic between Rose St and S Limestone.
Please see the move-in map for complete details.
